metadata.description: Arctic sea ice extent from satellite observations (monthly data)

source.organization: National Snow and Ice Data Center (NSIDC)
source.citation: Fetterer, F., K. Knowles, W. N. Meier, M. Savoie, A. K. Windnagel, and T. Stafford. 2025. Sea Ice Index, Version 4. Boulder, Colorado USA. NSIDC: National Snow and Ice Data Center. doi:10.7265/a98x-0f50

metadata.measurement_method: Satellite passive microwave observations (SMMR, SSM/I, SSMIS)
metadata.migration_note: NSIDC migrated from V3 (CSV/FTP) to V4 (Excel/HTTPS) in December 2023
metadata.threat_status: Dataset downgraded to "Basic" service level; NSIDC facing funding constraints (2025)
metadata.preservation_priority: CRITICAL - 47-year continuous satellite record, shows dramatic climate change
